Take your pick but there are no other options are there?

Well, actually we do have facts about what Garland has against Trump: Trump kept government records, Trump obstructed their return, Trump lied about giving them all back, Trump had top secret docs. All of the above are illegal.
Democrat claims (as in impeachment and Russia) have amounted to nothing not because of Trump's innocence, but because of other factors. RE impeachment, it was the fact that Republicans voted to ignore Trump's "serious crimes and misdemeanors," twice! RE Russia, we had lots of evidence about the Russian conspiracy and collaboration with Trump, but not quite enough to reach the legal standard. Why not? Because many people took the 5th, evaded interviews, or hid/concealed electronic evidence. RE obstruction, Mueller had enough to charge Trump but didn't because of the informal tenet that one does not charge a sitting president. 
Your "2 choices" paragraph is addressed above.
What say you?

So how do you have the "FACTS" that you stated in the first paragraph? Did they come from the media who told you they had "a source" in the FBI? Do you actually consider that to be a fact without any proof as though the FBI and mainstream media have not lied frequently about EXACTLY this sort of thing?
YOU have ZERO facts about Trump/Russia collusion unless you do not believe the report prepared by Robert Mueller and 19 DEMOCRAT prosecutors. That report actually states that they could find NO FACTS THAT ANY AMERICAN HAD COLLABORATED WITH RUSSIA TO AFFECT THE 2016 election.
IF you do not believe me then go read the actual Mueller Report. It is right in it even though Democrats like to skip over the facts!
IF people "took the fifth or evaded interviews, how would you know that you had facts against Trump? You cannot use that both as your excuse for not convicting him as well as your justification for his guilt.
Common sense would tell you that. You should invest in some!

I do plead guilty to believing the media, the FBI, the NARA, and the DOJ about what's going on here. To not believe all those institutions would be to embrace a HUGE conspiracy theory that I see no justification for. What have the FBI and media lied about so egregiously that leads you to mistrust them so?
RE the Mueller Report, I have read summaries and TRIED to read the whole thing(!). It seems that you and I might both be right about this. You are sort of correct, and I am sort of correct. Here's the actual sentence in the Mueller Report: "While the investigation identified numerous links between individuals with ties to the Russian government and individuals associated with the Trump campaign, the evidence was not sufficient to charge that any member of the Trump campaign conspired or coordinated with representatives of the Russian government to interfere in the 2016 election (227)." 
So they found lots of facts, but they didn't find enough to CHARGE anyone. As I stated above, "because many people took the 5th, evaded interviews, or hid/concealed electronic evidence. RE obstruction, Mueller had enough to charge Trump but didn't because of the informal tenet that one does not charge a sitting president." The Senate Intelligence Committe found more "facts" that showed Manafort and Stone's connections with Russians to be particularly troubling, and they found ""a breathtaking level of contacts between Trump officials and Russian government operatives. . . ."

RE people taking the 5th, evading interviews, and concealing evidence, my common sense tells me that what they are hiding is probably related to what the FBI is suspicious of. And I CAN certainly restate Mueller's conclusion that they didn't have enough evidence to charge . . . but still suspect. 
You might take a look (if you haven't) at the Senate Intelligence Committee's report. They were not looking at criminality, but they did see what they found as evidence of collusion. "This is what collusion looks like" was one statement by a member. 
The fact that Roger Stone was convicted of lying to congress about his associations with Wikileaks (and the Russia connection) is just one bit of common sense evidence for collusion. Ask yourself this, if NOTHING was going on, why were there so many contacts between Russia and Trump folks? Can you name ANY OTHER AMERICAN PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE that had even one tenth of the number of contacts? 
What do you think?
